00225 #define CSL_I2C_SETSTART()                                                    \
00226         CSL_FINST(CSL_I2C_0_REGS->ICMDR, I2C_ICMDR_STT, SET);
00227 
00229 #define CSL_I2C_RESETSTART()                                                  \
00230         CSL_FINST(CSL_I2C_0_REGS->ICMDR, I2C_ICMDR_STT, CLEAR);
00231 
00233 #define CSL_I2C_SETSTOP()                                                     \
00234         CSL_FINST(CSL_I2C_0_REGS->ICMDR, I2C_ICMDR_STP, SET);
00235 
00237 #define CSL_I2C_RESETSTOP()                                                   \
00238         CSL_FINST(CSL_I2C_0_REGS->ICMDR, I2C_ICMDR_STP, CLEAR);
